theory: Charlie is green, but often kind, even when he is blue and cold. Fred rather resembles the rainbow, as he is green, red and blue. Fred is also said to be very kind. Harry seems to be round. If a kind person is green and a bit blue then they are also nice. When someone is kind yet can be cold and blue, they will also be very big. Someone with rough and green feet is invariably kind. Kind people that are round are on the big side. When a person is blue, rough and kind then it means they also are cold.
